column5: Hey, i'm just wondering if anyone has experiance using the new Garmin Bluechart g2 Vision maps? Ive used the old Bluechart series, they were ok but they were reallly a digital copy of the Canadian Hydrographic Maps.  Also if you have used them before and your gps supports screen captures, can you take a couple shots of what they look like?   Thanks a bunch.
Oh and if anyone has the Lake of the Woods/Rainy Lake g2 maps, are they worth the investment, or should I stick with regular bluechart?
